name: Color Block 3D: Perfect Line
description:
Welcome to Color Block 3D. This is the perfect game for all the fast paced puzzle game lovers. It is addictive, challenging and fun. Be prepered to test your reflexes and fast thinking to the MAX.

HOW TO PLAY:
Just tap on the screen to make the brick road turn and shift in order to fill the emty holes on the way.

Get the game right NOW for FREE and star playing with your friends to see who can get the highest score.

Have fun and enjoy.
